Version 2.1.0 - Quiz Redirect + SmartLearning CSS + Forum/Label Support

Bug Fixes

  • Quiz embed now redirects directly to attempt.php when targetSlide or furthestSlide parameter is present, bypassing the view.php transient page
  • Removed whole-activity progress message from quiz view.php to prevent incorrect position tracking during tag navigation

New Features

  • Forum redirect support: Forums now include displayHint='redirect-forum' and redirectPath for SmartLearning forum page integration
  • Label inline display: Labels include displayHint='inline-content' for direct content display in course view
  • Course content API returns displayHint field for frontend rendering decisions

Improvements

  • Apply SmartLearning design system CSS to all embedded activities for visual consistency
  • CSS custom properties matching SmartLearning design tokens (colors, spacing, radius, shadows)
  • Quiz-specific styles: question cards, answer options hover states, navigation block
  • Book/Lesson-specific styles: centered content with max-width, improved typography

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.99: Whole-activity tagging + activity-progress message type + hide hamburger menu
  • v2.0.98: Activity position tracking for quiz, book, lesson + embed mode for all activities
  • v2.0.96: Fix iSpring modern navigation + suspend_data parsing
